DOC.brief_summary: Previous studies indicated high frequency of abuse in families and its consequences. Considering the importance of interventions such as educational interventions, in order to increase women's abilities to prevent abusive behaviors, the current research aims to determine the impact of an Liberty program on prevention of violence against women and propose solutions for less damages and consequences.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Liberty Program on Women's Health and Intimate Partner Violence
DOC.criteria: Be married, Be under the aegis of Foundation at least for a year, Have at least one child. Not participating in two educational sessions, Not being interested in continuing the cooperation.
